description.en: I possessed the body of 'Cersinia', the only sorceress in the Empire who can conjure the power of fire. Fortunately for me, I still had three years before the original story began. Determined to change my fate, I decided to visit a gambling house, where I hit the jackpot. But Instead of money, I was offered a young slave boy as collateral. "Regarding your name, what about Ben?" "I like it. Ben… it sounds good. Thank you…." As I took care of the poor boy, I started to grow fond of him. In a world with no one to turn to, I thought that I had finally met someone I could rely on, but... One day, the man who had agreed to remain by my side disappeared without a word.

description.en:
Reset, and game set.

When I opened my eyes, I was in a different world. I had become the game's villainous princess who was feared by all. Not to mention… Completely naked men I didn't even know were approaching me left and right!

“Are you cold? Shall I warm you up with a hug?”

“Oh? Have you not had enough yet?”

Seriously, what’s up with this situation? And just how the hell am I going to get out of this freaking game?!

---
I woke up in a strange bed, with not just one, but two lovers beside me! In this game of love, affection, and deception, I’m Elvia, the Imperial Princess, with a gaggle of men vying for my favor. Sounds great, right? Except this means I'm also stuck as the villainess while the main character is my manipulative maid, Arielle! She’s out to bring me down, and she’s got plans for my harem of men. But I know all her secrets, because I can see her player notifications. Can I beat her at her own game?

---

description.fr:
Dur, dur de se retrouver coincée dans le corps d’une psychopathe vicieuse haïe de tous! Surtout lorsqu’elle se révèle être la méchante d’un jeu vidéo de drague, destinée à mourir de mort violente. Une seule solution pour survivre: opérer un virage à 180 degrés: remettre de l’ordre dans l’empire, libérer les esclaves de l'ancienne princesse et changer son image auprès de tous. Mais c’est sans compter les ambitions de l’héroïne du jeu, bien décidée à massacrer sa rivale.

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en:
After three years of working for a black company, Akira was exhausted both mentally and physically.  
But one morning, what he saw on his usual way to work was nothing but a town full of zombies.   
How will the former company slave, Akira, live his life in a world that has completely changed overnight!?  

---

description.en:
A hangover leads to a shared life between a thief and a slave girl.
 
Harris is an adventurer who works as a thief and scout, a job that is often shunned due to poor reputation.
 
One day he gets drunk and buys a slave girl, Tiana. Tiana, who had been treated badly and not given enough food until then, comes to adore Harris, who treats her kindly, as her master. Harris, who had been hoping that Tiana would grow up to be a beautiful woman, is gradually drawn to her because of her innocence.
 
Harris' life changes drastically when he begins living with Tiana: warm meals, freshly washed clothes, and interaction with the townspeople who had never come close to him before. On the other hand, he finds himself in more and more troublesome situations, will he manages to escape from them with his skill and tact...?
 
This is the story of the "rebirth" of a shabby thief, which begins with an encounter with a slave girl.

altTitles.ja: しゅごキャラ！ ジュエルジョーカー

description.en:
The long-awaited comeback! A new story of Amu and her guardian characters begins...!

The cool and spicy Amu Hinamori has graduated from Seiyo Academy's elementary school and is finally a junior high school student! She thought she would have carefree days with her precious friends in junior high... until she is asked to take on a mission related to guardian characters and has to transfer to a new school...!

description.en:
This Spinoff Manga has content based starting from Volume 3 of the Light Novel.

"Dear diary… I got reincarnated as a slime."

Even in another world, lives aren't always on the line. There's plenty of work to be done, from feeding the community and forging the items the community needs; as well as plenty of play ...and hijinks throughout! Join Rimuru and friends as they kick back and enjoy their daily lives.
description.it: Questa è la serie spin-off ufficiale 4-koma di "Vita da slime"! A differenza della storia principale, questa vede la vita quotidiana di Limur da una nuova prospettiva!
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff tiene contenido basado de los Volumenes 3,4, y 5 de la Novela Ligera.

"Querido diario... me reencarne como un slime."

Incluso en otro mundo, las vidas no siempre estan en la linea. Hay mucho trabajo que hacer, desde alimentar a la comunidad y forjar los items que necesitan; como tambien hay un monton de juego... ¡Y travesuras!. Unete a Rimuru y sus amigos mientras que se relajan y disfrutan de sus vidas diarias.

description.en: The newly reincarnated Sheriel learns she has become the mother of Karthizel Roperam, the male lead of a dark romance fantasy novel. All the neglect Karthizel faces as a child leads him to become a crazy and obsessive man who’s willing to kill anyone to get what he wants, even his own mother! Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents, which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold, estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?

**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

description.en: Kumagai always gets visited by Takegawa, her childhood friend, but she knows that he only has it in for her friend, Misaki.

altTitles.ja: 虐殺ハッピーエンド

description.en: High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
description.ru: Старшекласснику Кусакабэ Макото приходится работать дни напролёт, чтобы собрать деньги на лечение младшей сестры, страдающей от тяжёлой болезни. Отец безработный, мать сбежала, бросив детей, издевательства на работе… Несмотря на всё это, он не теряет надежды и продолжает жить ради сестры. Но узнав, что ей осталось недолго, Макото впадает в отчаяние. Страх перед неизвестностью заставляет его по-другому взглянуть на ценность человеческой жизни.

This story takes place in Wardell Ceram, a country of flowers and trees. Luka and Sylvan, the "Wolf Claws", act as chivalrous thieves who steal from evil aristocrats. One day, the princess of the kingdom asks them to help her crack down on corrupt nobles.   
  
A thief x princess love comedy unfolds!

description.en:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
description.pt-br: Giant Killing é um mangá que conta a história de um técnico de futebol, ex-jogador japonês, que luta para levar times amadores à vitória contra times campeões. Tatsumi Takeshi jogava profissionalmente no East Tokyo United, o ETU, e era louvado pelos torcedores por dar tudo de si e levar o time à vitória. Certo dia decide sair do Japão para treinar um time amador Europeu, e desde então é considerado “traidor” por alguns japoneses. Então, dois membros da equipe do ETU vão atrás do técnico para que ele treine o time onde um dia foi jogador, para tirar o time do fundo do poço.

altTitles.ja: ONE PIECE カラー版

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

title.en: I Stole the First Ranker’s Soul

altTitles.en: I Stole the Number One Ranker's Soul

altTitles.es-la: Robé El Alma del Ranker Número Uno

description.en:
One day, Son Mo-Ah fell into a dungeon and became a gathering hunter.
Son Mo-Ah, who somehow narrowly escaped death, was going to live a normal life but gets caught up in a dungeon yet again.
In a moment of crisis, she is rescued by Seo Ji-Han, the number one ranker, and succeeds in surviving the situation. Somehow, Son Mo-Ah got entangled in a fateful relationship with said number one ranker.

But he said something really unusual to me.

“Promise me that you will kill all the dungeons bosses in this world, as many as you can.”

What?

title.en: Tearmoon Empire: Collection of Short Stories

altTitles.ja: ティアムーン帝国物語短編集@COMIC

description.en:
A collection of stories of tragedy and joy told from the perspective of Mia and those around her, from other the original and current timelines.

Manga adaption of the collection of short stories side volume of the light novel.

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

description.en: Jiheon, a once promising swimmer who was forced to retire due to injury, is now faithfully working in a sports agency office. The latest swimmer of interest for sports marketing is none other than Kwon Jaekyoung, and in order to secure him, agencies began engaging in a fierce underwater battle. Meanwhile, after Jiheon’s boss ordered him to meet with Kwon Jaekyoung, he used the small connection from having gone to the same swimming pool a decade ago to lock in the meeting. But when Jiheon came to meet him, Kwon Jaekyoung showed no interest in the terms of the contract, and oddly enough, he only asked about Jiheon’s trait…

altTitles.ja: 影の英雄の日常譚　勇者の裏で暗躍していた最強のエージェント。組織が解体されたので、正体隠して人並みの日常を謳歌する。

altTitles.ja-ro: Kage no Eiyuu no Nichijoutan: Yuusha no Ura de Anyaku Shite Ita Saikyou no Agent. Soshiki ga Kaitai Sareta node, Shoutai Kakushite Hitonami no Nichijou o Ouka Suru
Kage no Eiyuu no Nichijou-tan ~Ichi no Yuusha no Ura de An'yaku Shite ita Saikyou no Eijento, Soshiki ga Kaitai sareta no de, Shoutai Kakushite Hito-nami no Nichijou wo Ouka suru~

altTitles.th: ชีวิตประจำวันของผู้กล้าเงาสุดแกร่ง

description.en:
The "Great War of Heroes," in which the hero and the demon king vie for survival and power in each incarnation. The fourth great war was also a war where the heroes defeated the Demon King… it's an undisclosed fact. Twoeight, the ace of the “Agency” in the dark side of kingdom, undertakes all the dirty work for country and supports the Hero to subjugation the Demon Lord from shadows. As the unsung hero, Twoeight hopes to live a peaceful life after the war. However, defeating the Demon Lord is not enough to bring peace to the world.

This is a story about an awkward boy who is a former “behind the scenes” agent. Fights, opposes, and tries as hard as he can to protect his daily life.

altTitles.ja: 元ガチ勢、初心者に生まれ変わる

altTitles.zh: 全裸菜鸟在异世界被摩擦

description.en:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?
description.ja:
人気絶頂を誇ったゲームでもその寿命は限られている。実に15年もの歳月を一つのゲームにぶち込んだガチ勢・「淀水アムロ」は、ゲーム内で人生を賭けた一世一代の大博打に挑戦するがあえなく失敗。全てを失い気を失ったアムロが目覚めた所は、リリース初期の15年前だった。回帰前と同じ轍は踏まないと誓うアムロ。全てを知り尽くしたソシャゲ廃人は、最強のニュービーとして蘇る！

description.zh:
沉浸在虚拟游戏中的35岁宅男李煜阳不仅众叛亲离、借贷负债，还在游戏中赌输了唯一能还债的机会，在他绝望之际竟然阴差阳错穿越回了15年前，此时游戏还只是测试版，一切才刚刚开始，借此机会李煜阳想要改变人生，咸鱼翻身，踏上致富之路……凭借着十几年的经验与记忆，他脱下盔甲和内裤，决心站在游戏之巅，单纯地享受这一切！然而这一次，他会走向怎样的未来呢？

altTitles.ja: 百木田家の古書暮らし

altTitles.en: Living in an Antiquarian Bookstore of the Karakida Family

description.en:
The world's largest collection of used bookstores, Kanda-Jinbōchō. There begins the story of the unforgettable days the three Karakida sisters spend surrounded by the scent of used books when they inherit the used bookstore their grandfather left behind.
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/gj_karakida)
description.es: Kanda Jinbouchou, el barrio de librerías de segunda mano más famoso del mundo. Las tres hermanas Karakida se trasladaron a la ciudad para cuidar la herencia de su abuelo. Rodeadas del aroma de los libros usados, las tres hermanas hilvanan su día a día.
description.ja: 世界一の古書店街・神田神保町。祖父の遺した古本屋を引き継ぐため、その街で暮らすことになった百木田（からきだ）三姉妹。古本の香りに包まれながら三姉妹は色褪せない日常を紡いでいく――。

altTitles.ja: ひらつかわいいしずかわいい (やはり俺の青春ラブコメはまちがっている。)

altTitles.ja-ro: Hiratsu Kawaii Shizu Kawaii (Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru.)

altTitles.ja: Hiratsu Cute, Shizu Cute! (My Youth Romantic Comedy Is Wrong As I Expected.)

description.en:
Hiratsuka-sensei not being able to get married is wrong as expected!  
  
Follow the chemistry between Hachiman and Hiratsuka-sensei in this Oregairu doujin by Twitter user @poipoipoita.

altTitles.ja: 異世界もう帰りたい

altTitles.en: I Want To Go Back Home.

description.ja:
平凡なサラリーマン×異世界=しょんぼり転生…!?
普通に働き、普通にご飯を食べ、普通に寝る。そんな平凡なハッピーで物足りた日常を過ごすサラリーマン・下山口一郎。
ある日突然、英雄として異世界に召喚されたけど、評価は★1つのハズレガチャ扱い……。
「嗚呼、もう帰りたい……」下山口の明日はどっちだ──!?

description.en:
The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu Estou Sendo Criada por Vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

title.en: Aisare Tenshi na Classmate ga, Ore ni Dake Itazura ni Hohoemu

altTitles.ja: 愛され天使なクラスメイトが、俺にだけいたずらに微笑む

altTitles.en: The Classmate Who Is Adored by Everyone Smiles Teasingly Only at Me

altTitles.pt-br: A Colega de Classe que é Adorada Por Todos Sorri Provocativamente Apenas Para Mim

description.en:
Girls and sweets are full of secrets!? 

Ichise Souma is a high school student who dreams of becoming a pastry chef and devotes himself to making sweets. He meets Satomi Chika, a female classmate, after receiving some sweets. 

Chika is a beautiful girl with a soothing personality, known at school as the “Angel of Peace.” Souma thought she was a good girl who would kindly listen to his worries about making sweets, but... 

"Ichise-san, your embarrassed face is really cute." 

Chika shows an unexpected side of herself only when they are alone, and Souma’s heart is on the verge of exploding! A sweet and stimulating boy-meets-girl story with a mischievous angel connected by sweets begins!
description.ja:
パティシエになることを夢見てお菓子作りにはげむ高校生・市瀬颯真。
彼はお菓子の差し入れをきっかけに、クラスメイトの女子・里見千佳と出会う。
千佳は校内で“安らぎの天使”と呼ばれる癒し系の美少女。
颯真のお菓子作りの悩みも優しく聞いてくれるいい子、だと思っていたのだが――

「……市瀬さんの恥ずかしがる顔って、すごく可愛いんですね」

ふたりきりの時だけ意外な一面を見せてくる千佳に、颯真の心は爆発寸前！
お菓子が結ぶいたずらな天使との、甘くて刺激的なボーイ・ミーツ・ガール、開幕！
description.pt-br:
Meninas e doces estão cheios de segredos!? 

Ichise Souma é um estudante do ensino médio que sonha em ser confeiteiro e se dedica à confecção de doces. Ele conhece Satomi Chika, uma colega de classe, após receber alguns doces. 

Chika é uma linda garota com uma personalidade calmante, conhecida na escola como o “Anjo da Paz”. Souma achava que ela era uma boa garota que ouviria gentilmente suas preocupações sobre fazer doces, mas... 

"Ichise-san, seu rosto envergonhado é muito fofo." 

Chika mostra um lado inesperado de si mesma apenas quando estão sozinhos, e o coração de Souma está prestes a explodir! Começa uma doce e estimulante história de Garoto conhece Garota com um anjo travesso conectado por doces!

altTitles.vi: Tối Cường Phản Sáo Lộ Hệ Thống

description.en:
Scamming all day, every day, often venturing alone. He bluffs to get the ultimate power in this cultivation world?! world traveler Xue Que doesn’t always bluff, but he needs to.  
  
"Before you get your hopes up, The Character is Absolute Garbage, The Manhua is Pure comedy at best… The plot ehhh not so much"  
  
Term : META Stands for (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming is any strategy, action or method used in a game which transcends a prescribed ruleset, uses external factors to affect the game, or goes beyond the supposed limits or environment set by the game. Another definition refers to the game universe outside of the game itself. *(citation needed)*
description.fr:
Escroquer toute la journée, tous les jours, souvent en s'aventurant seul. Il bluffe pour obtenir le pouvoir ultime dans ce monde de culture ! Le voyageur du monde Xue Que ne bluffe pas toujours, mais il en a besoin.

Terme : META signifie (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming est la stratégie, l'action ou la méthode utilisée dans un jeu qui transcende un ensemble de règles prescrit, utilise des facteurs externes pour affecter le jeu, ou va au-delà des limites supposées ou l'environnement établi par le jeu. Une autre définition fait référence à l'univers du jeu en dehors du jeu lui-même.

altTitles.ja: ハロー、イノセント

description.en:
From cotton candy scans:  
  
Yukito is a handsome scholarship student who also excels at sports. Just starting high school, he has never had the time to think about things like love.  
  
One day, he was saved by a girl he didn't know. Turns out, she's actually Yukito’s classmate who’s been absent since the school’s opening ceremony…

'Sonidor', a dream artisan who enters into other people's dreams through physical contact and grants wishes that could not be fulfilled in reality. One day, the emperor suddenly arrives at the house and asks to wake up the crown prince who has fallen into eternal sleep. "I want you to wake him up."

Sonidor enters the dream of 'Marmel', the crown prince who is praised by everyone for his gentle nature and beautiful appearance, but somehow Marmel's dream is gloomy and desolate. “You were just going to kill me?!” 

According to the taste of the prince who hates people, Sonidor turns into various animals and finds the reason why Marmel fell asleep one by one, and Marmel gradually opens his heart to Sonidor... "Your Highness, do you believe me?" Will Sonidor be able to wake Marmel from his eternal sleep?
description.pl: "Będę trzymać jego ręce, by obudzić go z wiecznego snu"  Sodinor, ekspert do spraw snów, ma umiejętność spełnienia marzeń nawet w świecie snów. Na rozkaz cesarza została wprowadzona do snu księcia Marmella, który nie mógł się obudzić.  Jednak w snach księcia, który znany jest ze swojej dobroci i łagodności, jest coś bardzo dziwnego. Jego kraina marzeń jest opuszona i bezbarwna.   Sonidor infiltrując sny Marmella pod postacią uroczego zwierzątka udaje się znaleźć powód jego długiego letargu...  Czy Marmell obudzi się w końcu z wiecznego snu?

title.en: Song of the Sky Walkers (Long Strip)

description.en:
In the midst of an auspicious sign from the heavens, the emperor’s family gave birth to a special pair of twins—a male born with a forehead mole the colour of cinnabar, and a female born with six fingers. However, this brother and sister pair is cruelly separated by fate! One is taken eastward to celestial Penglai, to embark on the long road of cultivation. The other is abandoned in the reeds, to travel alongside an old swordsman through the mortal realm… As fate advances, how will the two fight destiny? Will they be able to reunite?

---

**Note:** This is the **long strip** version of [Song of the Sky Pacers](https://mangadex.org/title/a7120845-476e-4f54-9a95-f92cbd592176)
description.zh: 异象天光中，帝王家诞生一对特殊的双生龙凤胎，男婴额带朱砂痣，女婴长有六指。然而，这对血脉相连的兄妹却被命运残忍分开！一个被蓬莱仙长携走，踏上漫漫修仙路，一个被弃于芦苇荡，跟随老剑客在红尘中跋涉……天劫将至，二人将如何与天命相争？又会以何种方式重逢？

title.en: Kubo Won't Let Me Be Invisible

altTitles.en: Kubo-san Doesn't Leave Me (a Mob) Be

altTitles.fr: Kubo-san ne me laisse pas tranquille

altTitles.es: Kubo-san no me deja / Kubo-san no me deja ser (un personaje de fondo)

altTitles.id: Kubo-san Tidak Mau Membiarkanku (Seorang Jelata) Sendirian

altTitles.ja: 久保さんは僕(モブ)を許さない

altTitles.zh: 久保同学不放过我 / 久保同學不放過我

altTitles.ko: 쿠보 양은 나를 내버려 두지 않아

altTitles.en: Kubo-san Doesn't Leave Me Be (a Mob)

altTitles.it: Kubo non mi permette di essere invisibile

description.en:
First year high schooler Junta Shiraishi is a mob character who goes unnoticed even when he's standing right next to you. But his classmate, "heroine-level beauty" Kubo, always notices him and is there to tease him. Anyone can become special to someone, but it might be a little too early to call these feelings "love."

Perhaps this story is still two-steps from being a romantic comedy! A sweet comedy where a background character becomes visible!
description.es: Shiraishi Junta es un muchacho simplón que le faltan dos pelos para ser invisible ante sus compañeros de clase; en otras palabras, un personaje de fondo. Esto da entrada a Kubo, su bella vecina de asiento que siempre le da atención y juguetea experimentando con él para determinar qué tan "invisible" él es de hecho… y entonces, ella se declara a sí misma su "heroína"!!!
description.id:
Junta Shiraishi, siswa kelsa 1 SMA, adalah seorang cowok 'figuran' yang tak terasa kehadirannya. Biarpun duduk di sebelah orang, orang itu tidak menyadari kehadirannya, bahkan meskipun ikut terfoto dalam foto bersama, fotonya dibuatkan gambar wajah karena dikira absen. Hanya Kubo-san, cewek cantik teman sekelasnya yang 'level heroine', yang dapat menemukannya dengan matanya yang tajam, dan setiap hari mengusilinya.

Siapa pun bisa menjadi spesial bagi seseorang. Tapi, untuk sampai pada yang namanya 'cinta', perasaan kedua orang itu masih sedikit polos.
description.ru: Шираиши-кун - обычный школьник, только вот он очень неприметный, настолько, что даже одноклассники и учителя не замечают его. Ещё чуть-чуть и он был бы совсем невидимым. Другими словам "моб". В свою очередь, Кубо-сан - его прекрасная соседка по парте, только она постоянно замечает его. Кубо-сан игриво экспериментирует с Шираиши, чтобы оценить - насколько же он "неприметный" на самом деле… А потом объявляет себя его "героиней"!!!
description.pt-br: Estudante do Ensino Médio, Junta Shiraishi passa despercebido por todos, até mesmo quando ele está parado bem ali. No entanto, Kubo-san, a garota mais bonita de sua classe, parece encontrá-lo não importa onde esteja?!

description.en: Shen Chu, burdened with an incomplete soul, heads to Zhuo Lu, the cultivation world's most prestigious academy, with a very specific goal in mind. Upon his arrival, his world, previously dimmed by his incomplete soul, unexpectedly brightens due to a young man with striking blue hair. Could this be the person Shen Chu has been searching for? As he navigates the relaxing day-to-day life of academy studies, Shen Chu soon finds a complex web of intertwined timelines and ancient conspiracies unraveling around him, revealing secrets that could change everything.

Nearly a decade ago, the mysterious race known as "The Entities" arrived in this world.

Initially, people were fearful towards the unknown lifeforms. However, upon discovering that their "moulting" could bring tremendous progress and benefits, people gradually began to accept them, bridging up the gap between different species. 

Yet, just as celebrations of peace and prosperity were underway, seeds of destruction began sow silently, threatening to dismantle the entire system…
description.zh-hk:
神秘的種族「異人」來到這個世界已快屆滿十年，起初人們對於未知生命都感到非常恐懼。

但在發現他們的「蛻皮」能帶來巨大的進步與利益之後，便逐漸地接納了他們，消弭了異種之間的隔閡。

然而，就在祝賀和平共榮的慶典舉行之際，將整個體制破壞殆盡的種子卻在悄然蔓延⋯。

description.en: Why I no longer hate the pouring rain: Eight sticky stories that came with the damp monsoon.
description.ko: 쏟아지는 비가 싫지 않은 이유, 축축한 장마와 함께 찾아온 더 끈적한 여덟 편의 이야기
description.ru: Почему я люблю дождь: восемь историй, связанных с дождливым сезоном.

altTitles.ja: 異世界メタラー

description.en:
Alex, a devoted metalhead, finds himself in deep sorrow at his band’s breakup concert. Amidst the sadness, he experiences an electrical accident due to equipment trouble...

When he wakes up, he discovers he has been transported to another world! In this new world, Alex encounters situations that are a metalhead’s dream, featuring werewolves and dragons, which excite him immensely. 

Determined to lead this otherworld to peace with his metal spirit, Alex sets out on an adventurous journey!
description.es: Alex, un devoto metalero, se encuentra sumido en una profunda tristeza en el concierto de disolución de su banda. En medio de la tristeza, sufre un accidente eléctrico debido a problemas con el equipo... Cuando despierta, ¡descubre que ha sido transportado a otro mundo! En este nuevo mundo, Alex se encuentra con situaciones que son el «sueño de un metalero», con hombres lobo y dragones, que le excitan enormemente. Decidido a llevar a este otro mundo a la paz con su espíritu metálico, Alex emprende un viaje lleno de aventuras...
description.ja: メタルを深く愛するアレキは、バンドの解散ライブで悲しみに暮れる中、機材トラブルで感電事故に遭う……。そして目が覚めると異世界に転移していた！？ 異世界では、狼男、ドラゴンと『メタラーの夢』であるシチュエーションに次々遭遇し、興奮するアレキ。メタル魂で異世界を平和に導こうとするが……
description.es-la: Alex, un devoto metalero, se encuentra sumido en una profunda tristeza en el concierto de disolución de su banda. Decidido a llevar a este otro mundo a la paz con su espíritu metálico, Alex emprende un viaje lleno de aventuras...

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

The martial god of the Murim becomes a super-fast delivery man!

Before even reaching the age of forty, the martial god “Kang So” had conquered the world. While he was in the midst of consolidating his energy after reaching enlightenment, he suddenly descended into a newly formed rift…

He arrives in 21st century South Korea, a land desolated by gates and demonic beasts. Here, the martial god from the martial world, now a delivery man, shall bring peace!

description.ja: 暗殺を生業にしている豊田結途（トミタユズ）に下された謎の指令。 「今から会う奴を殺せ」。 しかし目の前に現れたのは、もう一人の自分で…!? 柴田ヨクサル×沢 真の『ブルーストライカー』コンビで贈る、予測不能の“殺し屋（ヒットマンズ）”アクション・コメディ!!

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality…

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: ジェノサイダー

description.en:
Violence, abduction, extortion, drugs, blackmail. This gang will do literally anything for money.  
One day, they kidnap a young girl, physically and mentally destroying her in the process. Seeing what was done to his beloved daughter, the girl's father loses his sanity, his anger turning into an obsession to find and torture every member of the gang, to ensure they die in the worst imaginable ways. Fires of revenge rage in his heart, and keep escalating. How will this tale of revenge end?

description.en: As the monster's teeth drew near, it was then that I remembered. "I've witnessed this scene before." This was the world of an RPG I played in my previous life. And I, as the main character's childhood friend, was the losing love interest who would be turned down by him in the future. The childhood friend whose role ended one hour into the opening after confessing to the main character as he was about to set off into his journey. The one many players sympathized with as the main character would meet another girl who would cling onto him during his journey. If I remain in this village, in the future I'll be the losing love interest?! To prevent that from happening, I'll leave the village and make use of my newly blossomed ability in compounds with becoming an alchemist at the royal capital as my aim. I don't give a damn about some job that requires me to be the main character's childhood friend. I'll be seizing happiness with my own hands!
description.fr: Alors que les dents du monstre se rapprochaient, c'est alors que je me souvins. «J'ai déjà été témoin de cette scène.» C'était le monde d'un RPG auquel j'ai joué dans ma vie précédente. Et moi, en tant qu'ami d'enfance du personnage principal, j'étais l'amoureuse perdante qui sera rejeté par lui à l'avenir. L'ami d'enfance dont le rôle s'est terminé une heure après le début du jeu, après avoir avoué mes sentiments au personnage principal alors qu'il était sur le point de se lancer dans son voyage. Celui avec lequel de nombreux joueurs sympathisaient en tant que personnage principal rencontrerait une autre fille qui s'attacherai à lui pendant son voyage. Si je reste dans ce village, à l'avenir je serai l'amoureuse perdante?! Pour éviter que cela ne se produise, je vais quitter le village et utiliser une nouvelle capacité que j'ai acquise avec comme objectif de devenir alchimiste dans la capitale royale. Je me fous d'un travail qui m'oblige à être l'ami d'enfance du personnage principal. Je vais saisir le bonheur de mes propres mains!
description.id: Saat gigi monster itu mendekat, saat itulah aku ingat. "Saya telah menyaksikan adegan ini sebelumnya." Ini adalah dunia RPG yang kumainkan di kehidupanku sebelumnya. Dan aku, sebagai teman masa kecil tokoh utama, adalah kehilangan minat cinta yang akan ditolak olehnya di masa depan. Teman masa kecil yang perannya berakhir satu jam ke pembukaan setelah mengakui karakter utama saat ia akan berangkat ke perjalanannya. Satu-satunya pemain yang bersimpati sebagai tokoh utama akan bertemu gadis lain yang akan menempel padanya selama perjalanannya. Jika aku tetap di desa ini, di masa depan aku akan kehilangan minat cinta?! Untuk mencegah hal itu terjadi, aku akan meninggalkan desa dan memanfaatkan kemampuan baru saya berkembang dalam senyawa dengan menjadi seorang alkemis di ibukota kerajaan sebagai tujuan saya. Saya tidak peduli tentang beberapa pekerjaan yang mengharuskan saya untuk menjadi teman masa kecil tokoh utama. Aku akan merebut kebahagiaan dengan tanganku sendiri!
